text: IFK Motala is a sports club in the town of Motala in Sweden. It was founded in 1932. The club has bandy and soccer sections. The men's bandy team plays in Elitserien. The club won the Swedish national men's bandy championship in 1987. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:1932 establishments in Sweden Category:Bandy clubs in Sweden Category:Swedish football clubs
title: IFK Motala
